医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
利用教育专业知识对抗 TikTok 错误信息一项新研究称，随着越来越多的年轻人根据平台上的低质量内容进行自我诊断，教育心理学家可以帮助打击 TikTok 上的心理健康和神经多样性错误信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Leveraging-educational-expertise-to-counter-TikTok-misinformation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Leveraging-educational-expertise-to-counter-TikTok-misinformation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=215a65ef-2dbe-4f14-a5ee-749d6db97f88 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 00:21:10 -0400 Leveraging educational expertise to counter TikTok misinformation
日常产品对健康影响进行排名：哪些对您有害，哪些使您更健康？ Building H Index 2024 对 75 多种非保健产品对人类健康的影响进行了评级，确定日常用品如何影响饮食、睡眠、身体活动、社交互动和户外行为。该报告推动公司通过小规模产品修改来改善健康结果的责任。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Everyday-products-ranked-for-health-impact-Which-ones-are-harming-you-and-which-are-making-you-healthier。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Everyday-products-ranked-for-health-impact-Which-ones-are-harming-you-and-which-are-making-you-healthier。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b9ecd1f-8365-4093-beae-a9830bf965a4 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 00:11:00 -0400 Everyday products ranked for health impact: Which ones are harming you and which are making you healthier?
历史回顾揭示了法国对抑郁症研究的贡献在一个心理健康意识处于公众讨论前沿的时代，一项新的历史回顾正在揭示法国对我们理解抑郁症的贡献，这一点经常被忽视。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Historical-review-reveals-French-contributions-to-depression-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Historical-review-reveals-French-contributions-to-depression-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79dfad29-d239-4fc0-8698-3ea2450a570a Wed, 16 Oct 2024 00:10:00 -0400 Historical review reveals French contributions to depression research
体内脂肪过多会显着增加绝经后乳腺癌的风险《流行病学与社区健康杂志》在线发表的西班牙研究表明，约 40% 的绝经后激素阳性乳腺癌病例可能与体内脂肪过多有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Excess-body-fat-significantly-increases-risk-of-postmenopausal-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Excess-body-fat-significantly-increases-risk-of-postmenopausal-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a9f2fa1-fb61-4780-b63b-72303ded3c02 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 00:05:35 -0400 Excess body fat significantly increases risk of postmenopausal breast cancer
安全储存对于预防儿童药物中毒至关重要新数据显示，2009 年至 2023 年间，美国因吞咽药物或非法物质而癫痫发作的儿童数量增加了一倍。研究结果于今天（周三）在欧洲急诊医学大会上公布。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Safe-storage-crucial-to-prevent-child-drug-poisoning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Safe-storage-crucial-to-prevent-child-drug-poisoning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50a7e9c1-7572-45fc-963a-d6fca9c24c38 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 00:01:57 -0400 Safe storage crucial to prevent child drug poisoning
造成坚果过敏的威胁是表面污染，而不是空气过敏和航空医学专家在《儿童疾病档案》上发表的证据审查中表示，没有证据表明人们普遍认为坚果过敏原可以通过飞机通风系统传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Surface-contamination-not-air-poses-nut-allergy-threat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Surface-contamination-not-air-poses-nut-allergy-threat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c59ec7a0-0957-477a-aa17-3d5f2d2db03e Tue, 15 Oct 2024 23:57:53 -0400 Surface contamination, not air, poses nut allergy threat
研究探索 TBI 与阿尔茨海默病之间的分子机制每年，大约有 250 万人遭受创伤性脑损伤 (TBI)，这往往会增加他们晚年患阿尔茨海默病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Research-explores-molecular-mechanisms-connecting-TBI-to-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Research-explores-molecular-mechanisms-connecting-TBI-to-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3d446e5-9fe4-4f5d-b5da-9c9ff5a16d06 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 23:55:00 -0400 Research explores molecular mechanisms connecting TBI to Alzheimer's
利用 miRNA 的力量进行癌症诊断和治疗这项研究由段世伟博士（中国浙江省杭州市杭州城市大学医学院临床医学系）领导。他的团队分析了有关miRNA的文献，总结了这些小分子与癌症之间的密切关系。 miRNA是一类非编码RNA，不编码蛋白质，但可以靶向60%以上的人类蛋白质编码基因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Harnessing-the-power-of-miRNA-for-cancer-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Harnessing-the-power-of-miRNA-for-cancer-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f65ab2e4-f162-49cf-8522-0f1ef3c04d2a Tue, 15 Oct 2024 23:52:48 -0400 Harnessing the power of miRNA for cancer diagnosis and treatment
严重精神疾病与老年人发生脆性骨折的风险较高有关伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，50 岁以上患有严重精神疾病的人比一般人群更有可能发生脆性骨折，但被诊断为骨质疏松症的可能性较小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Severe-mental-illness-linked-to-higher-risk-of-fragility-fractures-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Severe-mental-illness-linked-to-higher-risk-of-fragility-fractures-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aaaee7bf-2a88-494b-b588-ccfc3926c637 Tue, 15 Oct 2024 23:51:00 -0400 Severe mental illness linked to higher risk of fragility fractures in older adults
短期化疗可提高宫颈癌患者的生存率伦敦大学学院和伦敦大学学院医院的研究人员领导的一项临床试验发现，在放化疗前接受短期化疗的宫颈癌患者五年后存活且无癌症的可能性明显更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Short-course-chemotherapy-boosts-survival-rates-in-cervical-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241015/Short-course-chemotherapy-boosts-survival-rates-in-cervical-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db41d0f7-5a2d-4476-99d1-6045ca72802e Tue, 15 Oct 2024 23:47:00 -0400 Short course chemotherapy boosts survival rates in cervical cancer patients
